Title: The Botany of Desire.
Subtitle: A Plant's-eye View of the World.
Authors: Michael Pollan.
Categories: Social Science.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=7RjzwAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Pollan tells the story of four domesticated species - the apple, the tulip, marijuana and the potato, and describes how each has thrived by satisfying humankind's most basic desires..
